General.Name: Nexwise Intelligence China Limited
General.Description: Nexwise Intelligence China Limited engages in the provision of security and intelligent systems worldwide. The company's products include intelligent management systems, such as intelligent building management systems, data center comprehensive management systems, and comprehensive security management systems. It also offers intelligent public security systems, including wireless communication data management systems, high-definition night-version cameras, data analysis systems, electronic device detection systems, dangerous goods detection systems, and identity authentication systems. In addition, the company provides intelligent building management system solution; Cloud solution of facility management; security intelligent system solution; Block Chain application solution; intelligent water utility solution; energy management solution; and intelligent warehouse solution, as well as offers security services. It serves military, government, police, energy, and infrastructure markets. Nexwise Intelligence China Limited was founded in 2008 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

1.Name: Ms. Zhuoping  Li
1.Title: CFO, Sec. of the Board & Deputy GM
